items.sentence: Tom\'s brain was deprived of oxygen for too long.
Tom\'s dad hugged him and said that he loved him.
The two countries are antagonistic to each other.
The two teachers had an equal number of students.
Tom never should\'ve told Mary that he loved her.
Tom often pronounces people\'s names incorrectly.
It\'s hard to believe that that\'s a coincidence.
Tom and Mary both left the room at the same time.
Tom and Mary carved their initials into the tree.
I have no idea what we should be doing right now.
